page.description: The A5_COLOR_PICKER() function displays the color picker dialog box and returns the value of the selected color. Color picker, style (RGB = comma/plus sign/space separated RGB values, HEX = hexdecimal color).
page.syntax: Selected_Color as C = a5_color_picker([C style[,C color]])

argument.name: Selected_Color
argument.description: The numerical value of the selected color.

argument.name: style
argument.description: Optional. The way the color value will be specified. "RGB" - indicates that Color will be formatted "n1,n2,n3" or "n1+n2+n3", "HEX" - indicates that Color will be formatted

argument.name: color
argument.description: Optional. The initial color value to display. Character
